name: Treasure Transferral
description:
Aaaarrrr!! You need protect your treasure chest from other invading pirates by putting it into a safe on a nearby island. However you'd drown if you tried to swim across holding your treasure chest. Build bridges to across to other islands whilst dodging cannon fire in order to get your treasure safe!

Controls

Movement - Arrow Keys

Add Block - Space

Destroy Block - Mouse Click

Pick Up/ Drop Chest - Space

Collect Wood - Move near to tree

Made in HTML5 using Phaser.
